metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8765 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in watchOS 6.1. Processing maliciouslycrafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8765` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.24.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.24.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.24.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.24.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.24.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.24.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.24.4-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.24.4-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.24.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.24.4-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
